section.title: Cloud Scaling
section.para: &product; has been tested and qualified with a total of 200 total compute nodes in a single region (Region0).
&product; has been tested and qualified with a total of 12,000 virtual machines across a total of 200 compute nodes.
Larger configurations are possible, but &suse; has tested and qualified this configuration size. Typically larger configurations are enabled with services and engineering engagements.
